column1: Little Goat Diner////We also got the Brandade and Belly. Too be honest
column2: there was just too much going on on one plate here. Again
column3: the idea was good but I just don't think the meal followed through. There was belly pork
column6: brandade and fried eggs on the plate. I do have to say though
column7: I enjoyed the kimchi because it wasn't too spicy even though you would expect kimchi to be a lot spicer.
